message.entry: Input values must be binary (0 or 1).
The input length should be divisible by the value of the NumFrames property.
The input size must be greater than the constraint length.
The input must be a real-valued floating-point or logical data type.
The input length divided by the code rate (prior to puncturing) must be an integer multiple of the PuncturePattern property length.
Only rate 1/n codes from simple feedforward encoders are supported.
The puncture pattern must be a column vector containing only 1s and/or 0s.
The DelayedResetAction property can only be set to false.
The ResetInputPort property can only be set to false.
The InitialStateInputPort property can only be set to false.
The FinalStateOutput property can only be set to false.
